title: Why have Tutorial and Practice Tool if AI is abused as the same?
body:
I am so sick of PvP player coming into AI and abusing the game mode. They come in to try Champs/Builds and what ever but their main goal is always tunnel one lane, farm 40 KOs and kill core.... CAN I PLEASE ENJOY THE GAME????? GTFO

Stop Coming into our matches when you have multiple test options! Stop putting down our Game Mode just to say AI is worth your testing Champs/Builds!

We play AI because we want nothing to do with the Rancid PvP community but enjoy the game to its fullest. We as AI players completely destroy the enemy and their base in completion unlike PvP players. Please leave AI alone if you do not choose to respect our Playstyle....

replies.body: All we want to do is get our 400 XP + 50 BE and get out. {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Coop vs AI is a quick game for people get First Wins of the Day, or credit for Winning/Playing Match made modes for missions. While AI isn't the best place to test all aspects of a champ kit (due to AI awareness of environment; GP barrels, bring affected by Ryze e, etc) it is still an environment that is acceptable to test things in.

You want to try using go somewhere else to test because we don't want pvp players in the mode? The same cna be directed back to you. If YOU don't like a certain type of people being in an AI match, then YOU can go to the practice tool or create a Custom Game. There are options available for you to use as much as there are for others.
You do not own the game mode.

Gatekeeper is 100% correct- but to be more specific, you (ToolPunk) do not get to tell ANYONE how to play the game, hard period. Everyone gets to play however they want to play so long as they aren't intentionally losing. Which, against AI...
To be fair, we did have 1 mission where we had to intentionally lose at AI.

That entitlement though. Sorry dude, if I wanna warm up with a vs ai, im gonna stomp the shit out of em in the funnest way possible. I will rack up as many kills as I can, get as fed as I can, and win the game. What do you do? I dont get the difference. Why are you not destroying bots and getting fed? You wanna make up some house rules for vs ai? Im playing the game, not breaking any rules, but you wanna force me to play to your rules? What are those rules?
You’ve given no actual reasoning besides “waahh I don’t like it”. Well, myself (as a coop vs ai player since season 1) I wish players like you would leave ai and just play custom games.
Now I really wish that they put something on level OpenAIFive in the league so you have a challenge in that mod and test your skill against good AI and practice
